history.proof: intros H. qsimpl time: 1 use: sum_f_rw_0. qsimpl time: 1 use: le_plus_minus,sum_f_rw_0. srun best use: Rmin_assoc.

exceptions.tactic: replace (n + p) with ((n + p) + 0) by auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference n was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: replace (m + p) with ((n + p) + (m - n)) by (apply le_plus_minus_r; lia).
exceptions.exn: The reference m was not found in the current environment.
The LHS of sum_f_rw_0 (sum_f 0 _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The reference n was not found in the current environment.
Found no subterm matching "(?M2373 + ?M2374 - ?M2375)%nat" in the current goal.

original: intros H. replace (n + p) with ((n + p) + 0) by auto. replace (m + p) with ((n + p) + (m - n)) by (apply le_plus_minus_r; lia). rewrite sum_f_rw_0. rewrite <- sum_f_rw with (n:=n) (m:=m); [|lia]. rewrite <- Nat.add_sub_assoc; [|apply le_plus_minus; lia].
